Text: Thanks for the upload!  I'm glad to see you here on TPB.  Too bad Demonoid is down.
Will you be posting Regular Show?
thank you dwjp90, i thought you won't upload anymore :D

Thanks man, I always get your AT torrents from Demonoid and was worried when it went down.
Can you upload Sons of Mars, please. I realised how dependant I've been on Demonoid. :)
thank you so much for this!! please upload regular show! :)

PB doesn't get to say "oh shut up" at the end. But other than that. Excellent quality. Hope you can fix for future torrenters tho! :)
